log_level.label: Log Level
log_level.comment: Log messages at and above this priority level. You must also enable Magento's general logging under System > Configuration > Developer > Log Settings.

log_request.label: Log Platform API Requests
log_request.comment: You must also enable Magento's general logging under System > Configuration > Developer > Log Settings. NOTE: This should only be enabled on non-production systems. The request data can include sensitive customer data and your account credentials!

api_request_timeout.label: API Request Timeout (in seconds)
api_request_timeout.comment: Enter request timeout in seconds. DEFAULT: 7 seconds

payments_api_request_timeout.label: Payment Transaction API Request Timeout (in seconds)
payments_api_request_timeout.comment: Enter request timeout in seconds. DEFAULT: 90 seconds

cache_lifetime.label: API Data Cache Lifetime
cache_lifetime.comment: Enter cache lifetime value in seconds. DEFAULT: 300 seconds

allow_coupon.label: Save Coupons With Subscriptions
allow_coupon.comment: Allow coupons to be added when a customer creates a new subscription using the New Subscription page and saved with subscriptions created during the checkout process.

apply_discount_to_catalog_price.label: Apply Discount To Catalog Price
apply_discount_to_catalog_price.comment: Apply subscription discount when catalog price rule or special price discount is in effect.

cartrule_combine_type.label: Cart Rule Combine Type
cartrule_combine_type.comment: Specify how to combine the subscription discount with any shopping cart price rules or coupon code discounts.

use_hosted_my_subscriptions.label: Use Hosted My Subscriptions Page (EXPERIMENTAL)
use_hosted_my_subscriptions.comment: This is currently an experimental feature. Do no enable without consulting Subscribe Pro support.

use_add_to_order.label: Use Hosted Add-To-Order Feature (EXPERIMENTAL)
use_add_to_order.comment: This is currently an experimental feature. Do no enable without consulting Subscribe Pro support.

use_hosted_address_book.label: Use Hosted Address Book Widget (EXPERIMENTAL)
use_hosted_address_book.comment: This is currently an experimental feature. Do no enable without consulting Subscribe Pro support.

allowed_offline_methods.label: Allowed Offline Methods
allowed_offline_methods.comment: Enter a comma-separated list of payment method codes to allow these payment methods to be used on subscriptions.

useccv.label: CVV Required for Already Saved Cards

currency.label: Accepted Currency
currency.comment: One currency per Magento website must be selected. NOTE: Magento's currency conversion feature can be used to display values in multiple currencies, but payment transactions and orders will only be placed in the single base currency for the website.

always_save_card.label: Always save credit cards for later use
always_save_card.comment: Always save credit cards for logged in customers. Only applicable when "Save Card" Checkbox setting above is set to "No".

currency.label: Accepted Currency
currency.comment: One currency per Magento website must be selected. NOTE: Magento's currency conversion feature can be used to display values in multiple currencies, but payment transactions and orders will only be placed in the single base currency for the website.

subscribepro.label: Subscribe Pro Shipping
subscribepro.comment:
NOTE: Subscribe Pro shipping methods will only show up for recurring orders which are placed via the Magento API.
These methods will not show up on the frontend of your store.

free_shipping_minimum_order_total.label: Minimum Order Total for Free Shipping

free_shipping_minimum_order_total_intern.label: Minimum Order Total for Free International Shipping
